casebody.data:
The PEOPLE EX REL. Gerald SMITH, Appellant,
v.
Michelle ARTUS, etc., Respondent. 2017-1146 Court of Appeals of New York. February 8, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that relator has been released from respondent's custody and, therefore, he is not entitled to the extraordinary writ of habeas corpus (see People ex rel. Wilder v. Markley , 26 N.Y.2d 648, 307 N.Y.S.2d 672, 255 N.E.2d 784 [1970] ; see also People ex rel. Bourlaye T. v. Connolly , 25 N.Y.3d 1054, 12 N.Y.S.3d 17, 33 N.E.3d 1287 [2015] ).
